sentences.en: A plastic sheet was pegged down over the compost heap to hasten decomposition.
sentences.cn: 把塑料布覆盖在肥堆上,并用木桩固定好,以加速肥料的分解.

sentences.en: Additions of organic matter to soil hasten calcium losses.
sentences.cn: 土壤增施有机质会促进钙的损失.

sentences.en: An electric typewriter would hasten the work.
sentences.cn: 电动打字机会加速这项工作.

sentences.en: By hearty co - operation, the USSR could hasten victory and help lay the groundwork for postwar co - operation.
sentences.cn: 如果俄国衷心合作, 那它是加速取胜,并协同奠立战后合作基础的.

sentences.en: Could you manage to hasten the delivery?
Hence, attempts to hasten the significant task is uncalled for.
sentences.cn: 因此这种千秋大业的工作,是急不来的.

sentences.en: I hasten to add that I knew nothing of the fraud at the time.
sentences.cn: 我忙不迭地补充说,我当时对那个骗局一无所知.
现在我必须赶快回家了.

sentences.en: Jack had just time to get on the beanstalk and hasten down it.
sentences.cn: 杰克趁机跳上豆茎,急匆匆地向下滑去.

sentences.en: Mother read the children a bedtime story to hasten them to the land of Nod.
sentences.cn: 妈妈给孩子们念催眠故事,使他们快快进入睡乡.

sentences.en: News of the scandal certainly hastened his departure from office.
sentences.cn: 这一丑闻肯定加速了他的离任。

sentences.en: Police and firemen continued to hasten evacuation of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 警察和消防队员继续加快疏散饭店的工作.

sentences.en: Pray hasten her, for this delay has already imparted a tremor to my nerves. "
sentences.cn: 请你赶快催催她; 这么耽搁着,已经把我的神经弄得颤抖起来了. ”

sentences.en: Price total index rises somewhat, fundamental product value rises situation hasten delay.
sentences.cn: 价格总指数略有上升, 基础产品价格涨势趋缓.

sentences.en: She saw his frown and hastened to explain.
sentences.cn: 看到他皱起眉头，她赶紧解释。

sentences.en: The girls had to hasten their steps to keep pace with his.
sentences.cn: 女孩子们得加快步子才能赶得上他.

sentences.en: Their departure was hastened by an abnormally cold winter.
sentences.cn: 那个冬天异常寒冷，所以他们提前走了。

sentences.en: We wanted to arm the masses to hasten those processes.
sentences.cn: 我们要武装群众来加速这个过程.

trans.tran_en: to make something happen faster or sooner

trans.tran_cn: 加速，使加紧，催促，赶紧，赶快
